entities.name: padfoot
entities.description: Padfoot is mentioned as a character with the ability to control people, making them do terrible things without being able to stop themselves. (Excerpt: 'you know he can control people so that they do terrible things without being able to stop themselves.')

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the supporter of harsh measures against his supporters. (Excerpt: 'he started ordering very harsh measures against Voldemort's supporters.')

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned as a character who rose quickly through the Ministry and ordered harsh measures against Voldemort's supporters. (Excerpt: 'He rose quickly through the Ministry, and he started ordering very harsh measures against Voldemort's supporters.')

entities.name: ministry of magic
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic is mentioned as being in disarray due to the rise of terror. (Excerpt: 'the Ministry of Magic's in disarray, they don't know what to do')

entities.name: aurors
entities.description: The Aurors are mentioned as being given new powers to kill rather than capture. (Excerpt: 'The Aurors were given new powers — powers to kill rather than capture, for instance')

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Muggles are mentioned as being affected by the rise of terror. (Excerpt: 'but meanwhile, Muggles are dying too')

relationships.description: Padfoot is mentioned as being able to control people who support Voldemort. (Excerpt: 'you know he can control people so that they do terrible things without being able to stop themselves')
Crouch is mentioned as ordering harsh measures against Voldemort's supporters. (Excerpt: 'he started ordering very harsh measures against Voldemort's supporters')
The Aurors are mentioned as being given new powers by the Ministry. (Excerpt: 'The Aurors were given new powers — powers to kill rather than capture, for instance')
